titleStmt.title: Die Lunæ, 22. Maii, 1648. Ordered upon the question, by the Commons in Parliament assembled, that the several committees in the several and respective counties, and such other persons formerly instructed with the militia by authority of Parliament ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Edvvard Husband, printer to the honourable House of Commons,

notesStmt.note: Incorrectly identified on reel 2571:65 as Wing (2nd ed.) E2673.
Wing E2673A reads: Die Lnnæ [sic], 22. Maii, 1648.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library.
